alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 2:42PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Elko County through 315 PM PDT... At 242 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Clover Valley, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Brief heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clover Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County
